entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, St. Alban's
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 4 except minus 10 inland.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then light snow beginning before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light this evening. Low minus 4 except minus 10 inland. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain or snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain in the morning and ending in the afternoon then clearing. Fog patches developing in the morning. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon then light late in the afternoon. High plus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
